English: Kill the Golden Aibatt in dungeons and get drop bonuses!
French: Tuez les Aibatt dorés dans les donjons pour obtenir des bonus !

English: +30% Exp when it's night in game!
French: 30% d'Expérience en plus quand c'est la nuit en jeu !

English: Sun is here, x1.3 Exp is over...
French: Le soleil est levé, expérience x1.3 est terminé...

English: Complete Eggcellent's Meadow to get Pink Easter Eggs!
French: Complétez la Prairie Oeufissime pour obtenir des Oeufs de Pâques Roses !

English: Destroy the stars in the night sky to obtain star fragments!
French: Détruisez les étoiles dans le ciel nocturne pour obtenir des Fragments d'Etoiles !

English: Night has come! The stars are coming out.. Find them in the sky!
French: La nuit est tombée ! Les étoiles sortent... Trouvez-les dans le ciel !

English: Nighttime has passed, the stars are disappearing.
French: La nuit est passée, les étoiles disparaissent.

English: Spend fewer Dungeon Coins when taking on missions or entering dungeons!
French: Dépensez moins de Jetons de Donjon en partant en mission ou en entrant dans des donjons !

English: FlyFF Universe is turning 1! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
French: Flyff Universe a 1 an ! Un grand merci à tous nos joueurs qui ont rendu ça possible !

English: Login each day for 40 minutes and receive rewards!
French: Connectez-vous tous les joueurs pour 40 minutes et recevez des récompenses !

English: Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!
French: Atteignez de nouveaux niveau dans la période de l'événement et recevez des récompenses ! Seulement sur le serveur Championnant Flyff World.

English: Exchange FWC Gear at the [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!
French: Vous pouvez échanger les Équipements FWC avec [Manager FWC] Ava pour plus de récompenses !

English: The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted Exp and Drops and attempt to win exceptional prizes!
French: Le #bChampionnat Flyff World#nb est une compétition mondiale qui se tient jusqu'au 7 septembre 2023. Rejoignez ce serveur avec de l'Exp et des Drops boostés et tentez de gagner des prix exceptionnels !

English: Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests for the Gacha Machine NPC and receive exceptional rewards!
French: Gagnez des pièces en battant des monstres ou en accomplissant des quêtes pour le PNJ Gachapon et recevez des récompenses exceptionnelles !

English: Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them to NPC Bach
French: Ramassez des Notes de Musique et des Parchemins de Partition Musicale en chassant des monstrers et échangez les au PNJ Bach.
Amélioration du drop de morceaux de Pierre d'Amélioraion !

English: Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!
French: Enquête auprès des joueurs ! Visez des récompenses spéciales !

English: It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?
French: L'année a été exceptionnelle, alors il y a beaucoup de monstres qui veulent s'emparer des récoltes.\nIl est temps de les chasser ! Peux-tu nous aider ?
Boost du taux de chute boss!
Taux de chute du boss donjon +20%!

English: 1.3 Update Survey! Aim for special rewards!
French: Sondage de la Mise à jour 1.3 ! Visez des récompenses spéciales !

English: Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!!!
French: Échangez des lettres avec votre bien-aimé(e) ou votre ami(e) pour compléter les phrases ci-dessous !!!

English: Let's celebrate for 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!
French: Let's celebrate for 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!

English: FlyFF Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
French: FlyFF Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!

English: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon and own a permanent costume!
French: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon and own a permanent costume!

English: Complete Daily Quests to earn an opportunity to roll the dice for rewards!
French: Complete Daily Quests to earn an opportunity to roll the dice for rewards!

English: Plunder the treasure from the Pirate Ship!
French: Plunder the treasure from the Pirate Ship!

English: Login each day for 30 minutes and receive rewards!
French: Login each day for 30 minutes and receive rewards!

English: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!
French: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
French: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your whole life mastery gain by 20%!
French: Increase your whole life mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
French: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!

English: Increase your life production speed by 20%!
French: Increase your life production speed by 20%!

English: Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!
French: Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!

English: Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!
French: Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!

English: The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!
French: The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!

English: Increase gathering objects spawn count by 20%!
French: Increase gathering objects spawn count by 20%!

English: The maximum item count in the wandering merchant's shop has been increased by 2 during the event!
French: The maximum item count in the wandering merchant's shop has been increased by 2 during the event!

English: Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
French: Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.

English: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
French: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
